snippet.title: VergeWorld - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description:
VergeWorld is a digital event hosted by 3D Realms & friends, filled with world premieres, special guests, interviews, and much more. It is scheduled to take place on September 30, 2023, at 8 PM CEST / 2 PM ET / 11 AM PT. The event will be streamed live on 3D Realms' Twitch and YouTube channels.

VergeWorld is a celebration of all things first-person shooters, with a focus on indie games, boomer shooters, and retro-inspired games. The event will feature world premieres of new games, as well as updates on existing games from developers around the world. There will also be special guests, interviews, and more.

The VergeWorld 2023 Steam Sale will also be running during the event, offering discounts on a variety of games, including many of the games that will be featured at the event.

Here is a summary of some of the information that is available on Google about VergeWorld 2023:

The event will be hosted by Jared R Bair.
Some of the guests who will be appearing at the event include Boss Mike J, Larry Kuperman, Jason Smith, and Jon of the Shred.
There will be exclusive announcements from THQ Nordic, New Blood Interactive, Hyperstrange, and more.
The VergeWorld 2023 Steam Sale will also be running during the event.
